summary: This mod combines all my mods before it, so it adds the spelltomes Conjure Death Hound and Conjure Gargoyle to Ronthil in Castle Volkihar. It also adds the spelltomes Conjure Armored Troll and Conjure Armored Husky to Sorine Jurard in Fort Dawnguard. Also added Conjure Dwarven Sphere and Conjure Dwarven Spider spelltomes to a chest by Aether forge!
descriptionHtml:
This mod combines all my mods before it, so it adds the spelltomes Conjure Death Hound and Conjure Gargoyle to Ronthil in Castle Volkihar. It also adds the spelltomes Conjure Armored Troll and Conjure Armored Husky to Sorine Jurard in Fort Dawnguard. Also added Conjure Dwarven Sphere and Conjure Dwarven Spider spelltomes to a chest by Aether forge! It\'s also on their loot list so other side can kill them and get the spelltomes as well! They will level up with you so they should always be useful. Have fun and please let me know if there are any bugs!

Also thanks to Kuma0 who helped me out with this!
author: Giqu
